Fill My Cup Careers

 

Looking for a creative and inspired individual who would like to help launch a new cafe.

Job Position

Barista – Seeking inspired and energetic team members to provide friendly, responsive service to create an exceptional visiting experience for all of our guests. Each server’s primary objective is to show our guests such a marvelous time, they will want to return again and again.  Create exceptional coffee’s, smoothies, and other drinks. Service experience preferred.

Line Cook – Seeking inspired and energetic team members with kitchen experience responsible for menu items, kitchen cleanliness, and daily kitchen operations.   Accurately and efficiently grille meats and fish, fry, assist with baked goods and other hot food products, and make sandwiches. Also perform other duties in the areas of food and final plate preparation including plating and garnishing of cooked items and preparing appropriate garnishes for all hot menu item plates.  ​

1.Download Application

Just click the button below to download our application and print out​​.

Download Application

2.Fill it Out

Fill out your application and attach your resume.

3.Turn in to Our Store

Email to relax@fillmycupcafe.com or Mail to 1550 Hendersonville Road, Suite 100  Asheville NC 28803 address.

​We’ll give you a call if you’re a perfect fit!
